mapper.insert: MERGE INTO MOVIE_CREW mc USING (SELECT #{personId} AS person_id, #{movieId} AS movie_id FROM DUAL) src ON (mc.person_id = src.person_id AND mc.movie_id = src.movie_id) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET mc.crew_job = #{crewJob} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (person_id, movie_id, crew_job) VALUES (#{personId}, #{movieId}, #{crewJob})
